attributes.action: make a public apology for the recent scandal over the lovely gurkhas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is my considered opinion that the so called prime minister gordon brown should make a public apology for the recent shocking scandal over the gurkhas. the gurkhas regiment has done more good for this country than he will ever be capable of in the remaining time before the tories take over.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
